last_phrase: In conclusion, the International Programs ISI CNV led by Dr. Marco Paret offers a comprehensive academic consortium for individuals seeking to delve into the ancient and secret wisdom of magnetic hypnotism updated to quantum techniques. The school offers various paths of development, including the magnetic path, NLP-3 and nonverbal communication diploma courses, quantum coaching path, and more. With an organized curriculum, modern information modalities, and research projects, students can achieve their highest potential. Moreover, the Euro-Asian Academic Network conducts research on practical mental sciences, neuroscience, hypnosis, and esoteric paths of power and therapy. Lastly, individuals can open a chapter in their country and become a mentor to contribute to the research work of the school and organize courses.
